about_the_game:
Harem of Gods is an action roguelite that sees you, the unlikely hero, face off against the hordes of evil with help from beautiful gods. Plan your item builds, progress your relationships, and massacre the enemies that stand against you.

As you conquer evil, you form a harem with the gods. The more justice you serve, the more they want to give you special lewd rewards!

An ancient evil has decimated the overworld. But it's not too late to go back. Our hero has been given the curse of undying. His mistake unleashed the spirit of hell that now ravages the earth.

Every run you dedicate your skills towards one of the gods. Stay alive, slaughter the hordes, and they'll show you their appreciation by fulfilling your, and their, lewdest desires. Among a variety of gods with many breath-taking animated sex scenes and cute pixel art, you're sure to find what you want!

Get lost in a rich harem fantasy, spark a kindling relationship with the lewd gods as you fight to restore the world.

Demo Features

  • Complete the game up to the end of the first map.

  • Access to all permanent upgrades as you progress.

  • All sex animations for the Daughter of Death.

Game Features

  • Adult content created by a team of passionate artists.

  • Fully animated sex scenes.

  • Beautifully animated illustrations of each character.

  • Procedurally generated infinite maps.

  • Lewd hordes of sexy enemies.

  • Choose from many unique items to customize your strategy.

  • Different god abilities.

  • Permanent upgrades as you progress your hero.

  • Inspired gameplay from our favorite survivor games.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following content not intended for all ages.

Nudity, excessive violence, sex, explicit and clear genitalia, pornographic scenes between fantasy characters and monsters, BDSM, imprisonment, and crude language. All sexual acts depicted are consensual.

All characters in this game are 20 years of age or older.

This game contains highly explicit sexual content that is intended for adults only.

short_description: Gain the support of cute & lewd gods in your fight against an ancient evil. Form a harem, progress your relationships, and massacre the enemies that stand against you in this action roguelite.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
